duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts including scheduling, resource planning, and post-project data analysis.
Provide thorough knowledge and expertise in science topics for Elementary, Middle, and High School Science, and apply state and national science standards during item development and scoring process.
Communicate effectively with various roles via chat, email, phone, and videoconference meetings, and interact with customers and educators in-person and virtually.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in their roles, and provide expertise, management, and scoring for Math assessments.
Lead remote and distributed scoring teams, manage scoring reports, and drive scoring management decisions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
